summary: Iteration 4 testing for La Pulpería app - verified new features: favorites system, notification z-index fix, animated background optimization, and announcements with images. All 22 backend API tests passed. Frontend loads quickly (0.92s) with animated starfield background.

issues: ✅ Animated starfield background with twinkle effect working

critical_code_review_comments: ✅ Header.js: Notification dropdown has z-index: 9999 (line 133) - properly fixed
✅ MapView.js: Has 'Cercanas' and 'Favoritas' tabs with proper state management (lines 206-227)
✅ PulperiaProfile.js: Has favorite button with Heart icon and toggle functionality (lines 265-273)
✅ Backend server.py: Favorites endpoints implemented - GET /api/favorites, POST /api/favorites/{id}, DELETE /api/favorites/{id}, GET /api/favorites/{id}/check (lines 793-842)
✅ Backend server.py: Announcements support image_url field (lines 615, 631)
✅ Protected routes correctly redirect to login page when not authenticated

success_rate.frontend: 100% (landing page loads correctly with all features)

seed_data_creation: No seed data created - used existing data
context_for_next_testing_agent: All new features verified: 1) Page loads quickly (0.92s), 2) Notification dropdown z-index fixed to 9999, 3) Announcements support images via image_url field, 4) MapView has Cercanas/Favoritas tabs, 5) PulperiaProfile has favorite button with Heart icon, 6) AnimatedBackground throttled to 30fps. Favorites endpoints require authentication (correctly return 401). Protected routes redirect to login. All 22 backend tests pass.
